meanings.definition: The transportation of goods by a dray.
meanings.sent1: The drayages of the heavy boxes were done efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The drayages of the farm produce were completed by the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The drayages of the colorful balloons made the town look like a festival.
meanings.sent4: The drayages of memories carried by the heart are the most precious.
meanings.sent5: The drayages of laughter echoed through the streets.

meanings.sent1: The drayages for shipping the furniture were reasonable.
meanings.sent2: The drayages for delivering the goods were included in the invoice.
meanings.sent3: The drayages for moving the piano made everyone gasp.
meanings.sent4: The drayages for dreams are often paid in hard work.
meanings.sent5: The drayages for success sometimes come with unexpected rewards.
